about_the_game:
This is a lightly nurturing AVG game

“I have been thinking about one thing, what is the meaning of life in this damned world?”

I fit the social norm of having a stable jo, a house on a mortgage and plentiful of holidays.

I have done everything the society has asked of me, but everytime someone compliments me, I feel incredibly guilty and inferior

Why?

At the moment when I found out that my emotions had been reduce just to an ink on a regular report, I couldn’t hold on any longer

I thought my creation was to serve my life, but deep down I am slowly becoming numb to reality…

Its as if I am only a gear made to follow orders

Until, I met the angelic “her”

Until, I met “him” who lit the fire inside me

This lackluster life ushers in a transformation because of each other…

This is the story of Libre, who in the numbness of life came across a poem that has been marked into his heart for a long time, and meets his senior, Hershey.

The story of two people who, as they gradually feel empty in their lives, find their own touching stories as a result of this reunion

Game features

Full voiceover of the female lead

70+ CGs

A moving and inspiring pure love story

10+ original soundtracks

/
